data.text: @Carl32873301 It is still an ongoing, unresolved issue of which the NSW government fails to address - Didn't I just tell you that no teacher is teaching my students on Monday while I'm on leave? Just ask any teacher and they will give you the same answer that there aren't enough teachers.
@fkhmichael It’s 2022. It’s now March. Move on.
@k_miller08 @fkhmichael ‘Just not cricket,’ in my humble opinion.

@fkhmichael @MissKerrAus I have been running Teams lessons, posting work, marking, grading and writing reports (we report each term). But flagging fast today as I am feeling pretty awful. I believe (as I am not at school) it is still viewed as sick leave, I think?

@fkhmichael @k_miller08 @MissKerrAus That is a tough one. But if you are on sick leave, you are on sick leave! Do you have the option to work from home if you are positive, but not feeling ill, and not have this taken from your sick leave entitlements?

@k_miller08 @MissKerrAus I've set all the work and I should stay hands off since technically I'm on sick leave. That being said, though, my Year 12 has an assignment due this week and I promised previously that I'll read their draft... so the line is a bit blurred 😂
@fkhmichael @MissKerrAus Me too. Sick leave - but still teaching online? Not sure how that works??🤔
